function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of exposure to SARS-CoV-2 due to work-related hazards","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission in the workplace","Mitigation":"Installation of engineering controls such as high-efficiency air filters and physical barriers","Technologies":"High-efficiency air filters, clear plastic guards","People":"Workers, customers, and visitors in indoor areas","Owner":"Facilities management, employers"},{"Description":"Variability in COVID-19 risk levels","Impact":"Difficulty in implementing consistent risk mitigation measures","Mitigation":"Use of dynamic strategies in facilities management","Technologies":"Dynamic facilities management strategies","People":"Community members, public health authorities","Owner":"Facilities management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Effect of temperature on virus spread","Impact":"Influence on the transmission rate and survival of coronaviruses","Mitigation":"Adoption of strict social control measures in colder regions","Technologies":"Temperature control measures","People":"Community members in colder regions","Owner":"Public health authorities"}]}
